description: Scammer impersonates SBI bank officer claiming account will be blocked due to incomplete KYC. Attempts to extract UPI ID and bank details.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your SBI account will be BLOCKED within 24 hours due to incomplete KYC verification. Update immediately to avoid account suspension. -SBI Bank

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh no pls dont block my account i get my pension in that... i am old lady i dont know how to update kyc on phone... waht do i have to do sir pls tell me

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Madam this is urgent matter. I am calling from SBI head office Mumbai. Your account ending 4521 is showing KYC pending. Please verify your details to continue banking services.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta i am so scared i need my pension for my bp medicine... i am looking at my card now it is 5200 0005 1021 8321 and expiry says 09/27... teh small number on back is 602. my pan card is VEEPL0810D... is this what you need? do i have to send money to a safe account to check? pls give me teh account number or upi... i will do it now

turns.scammer_message: For verification, please share your registered mobile number and we will send OTP. Or you can directly update by paying Rs.10 verification fee to UPI ID: sbi.kyc.update@ybl

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am trying to pay teh 10 rupees... my phone number is 98100 55214... i typed sbi.kyc.update@ybl but my app is asking for name to confirm... what name should show there? i am very nervous i dont want to send to wrong person pls help

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir, just pay Rs.10 to sbi.kyc.update@ybl and your KYC will be updated within 2 hours. Also note down our helpline number for any queries: 9876543210

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am trying to do it but my phone is showing a name when i type that upi... i am so scared to press button without checking... what name is showing on your side? i dont want to send to wrong account pls tell me... i saved your number 9876543210 in my diary thank u beta

turns.scammer_message: If UPI not working, you can transfer to our verification account. Account number 50100123456789, IFSC: HDFC0001234, Name: SBI KYC Services. Amount is only Rs.10.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you beta... that upi was confusing me... ok i will try this bank account now... it is asking for the name... is it SBI KYC Services? i am typing it slowly to be sure
